name: Paul Adrian Maurice Dirac
alma_mater: University of Bristol, University of Cambridge
known_for: Dirac equation, Dirac comb, Dirac delta function, Fermi–Dirac statistics, Dirac sea, Dirac spinor, Dirac measure, Bra-ket notation, Dirac adjoint, Dirac large numbers hypothesis, Dirac fermion, Dirac string, Dirac algebra, Dirac operator, Abraham-Lorentz-Dirac force, Dirac bracket, Fermi–Dirac integral, Negative probability, Interaction picture
